name: GTA5-Mods Dark Theme - Updated and Improved
description:
An edit of the userstyle by Nick Brealey.

Mostly just fixes, but also some improvements for elements which weren't colored. 
I also fixed the coloring for admins/moderators (I am a moderator on the site).

For any bug reports or fixes please go to the Git repo: https://gitlab.com/Jitnaught/GTA5ModsDarkTheme
additional_info:
v1.3.2:
    Fixed stars that aren't meant to be green.
v1.3.1:
    Darkened login page.
    Fixed description fade on mobile.
    Fixed dropdown menus on mobile.
v1.3:
    Darkened all dropdowns.
    Darkened all text boxes. 
    Greenified the download, like, and star icons.
    Darkened tags.
    Darkened VirusTotal popup.
    Darkened Report file dialog.
    Darkened Account Settings page.
    Darkened Contact page.
v1.2:
    Now works on all gta5-mods sub-domains (all languages).
    Darkened comment fade.
    Fixed text color being too light in modal dialogs (delete/report comment and delete file dialogs).
v1.1:
    Fixed coloring of uploaded files on edit page.
    Lightened rating stars.
